title: Autogyro UAV Surveillance
description: A lightweight UAV with autorotating rotor, designed for long-range surveillance using Pixhawk and real-time computer vision.

title: Nutrition Data Analysis
description: Compared national food intake to WHO standards using Python and visualization tools.

title: Realtime ESP8266 Sensor Logger
description: Logged RPM and gyro data to SD card and served real-time HTTP data using ESP8266.

title: Deceptive Visualization
description: Built SpringBoot backend with Redis, JWT, and RabbitMQ to support async high-concurrency order flow.

title: Boston Bike Route
description: Map Visualization of Boston bike routes using Python and Folium, with data from the City of Boston.

title: Power Outage Duration Prediction
description: Built regression models on outage data to estimate restoration time after weather events.

title: DJI O4 Integration Test
description: Tested DJI Air Unit O4 for video streaming and sensor synchronization in UAV systems.
